duties_responsibilities.duty: Facilitate conversations and collaboration between interdisciplinary care teams, including Care Navigators, Care Coordinators, Primary Care Providers, Orthopedic and Physical Therapy teams.
Support patients in scheduling provider visits and ensure proper documentation of all patient contacts.
Answer and appropriately transfer patient calls, capturing patient referrals through inbound fax.
Identify and request necessary patient documentation from patients and community providers, ensuring seamless patient experience.
Assist patients in scheduling specialist appointments and provide operational and non-clinical support to outreach and navigation teams.
Follow through with any other duties as assigned.
